content.rendered:
We Transform Your Vision into Creative Results

We aim at designing and building innovative automation products which are easy to use. Our talented research and development team designed and developed a wide variety of smart products which are innovative and unique. The smart products are developed with the aim – “Empowering common people’s dream to turn into reality at an affordable price”.

Effective Solutions
Fall In Love With Our Features

We believe that all the automation products that we design, must operate seamlessly at the touch of a button. Our smart home automation products make users property safe, elegant, fun and easy to use. Home owners experience technology that is innovative, easy to use, and reliable. Our team is comprised of talented members from NITs and top management schools of India whose number one priority is to provide the best and quality products and services to our clients at a very affordable price.

Amplitech Touch Magic

Amplitech GPS Tracker

Live Tracking

Get real time data and performance metrics of your vehicles, wherever they may be.

SMS & Email Alerts

Alerts in the form of Push/Web/messages/E-Mail Notification Can be received from the GPS Software in activities.

History Log

Amplitech GPS Tracking Software is capable to store 90 days data of your vehicle movement tracking.

Engine Cut

This features enables you to control your vehicles ignition from anywhere anytime.

Multiple Alarm Mode

Get live over-speeding alerts, alerts on igntion , monitor idling in real time,Geo-Fencing etc.

Absolute Vehicle Safety

Now you don’t need to think twice while parking your vehicle anywhere
